title: MCP Server Configuration Schema
description: Schema for configuring MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers in the AI Coding Agent

name.description: Unique identifier for the MCP server

type.description: Transport type: 'url' for network-based servers (HTTP, SSE, WebSocket, etc.) or 'stdio' for local subprocess servers

url.description: The URL or endpoint for the MCP server. For stdio type, use 'file://localhost' or similar

authorization_token.description: Pre-configured authorization token, or null if OAuth flow is required

enabled.description: Whether the MCP server tools are enabled

allowed_tools.description: List of allowed tool names, or null for all tools

allowed_paths.description: For stdio servers: List of allowed file system paths

oauth_provider_configuration.description: OAuth configuration for servers requiring OAuth authentication. If null, OAuth discovery will be attempted.

command.description: Command to run for stdio servers (e.g., 'npx', 'node', 'python')

args.description: Arguments to pass to the command for stdio servers

env.description: Environment variables to set for stdio servers
